                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৯]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দেহে Pb এর পরিমাণ 50 ppb এর বেশি হলে লেডের বিষক্রিয়া দেখা দেয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 16</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত তাপমাত্রায় গ্যাসের আয়তন তাত্ত্বিকভাবে শূন্য হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        <br>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="width: 0.913em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মোট মোল সংখ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="width: 10.248em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm = \frac{x}{16}+\frac{x}{32} =\frac{2x+x}{32} =\frac{3x}{32}  </script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="width: 2.174em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1001.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm \therefore O_2 </script></span> এর আংশিক চাপ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="width: 3.117em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="width: 7.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.82em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-269"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm =\frac{x}{32}\times\frac{32}{3x}=\frac{1}{3}\times </script></span>&nbsp;মোট চাপ<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৭]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="width: 4.829em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-409"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>500</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>327</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>273</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>27</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>500</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><mn>300</mn></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm \frac{V_1}{T_1}=\frac{V_2}{T_2}\ &nbsp;{\Rightarrow V}_2=\frac{V_1T_2}{T_1}=\frac{500\times\left(327+273\right)}{\left(273+27\right)}=\frac{500\times600}{300}\\
=1000\ cm^3&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 20</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির তাপমাত্রায় কোনো গ্যাসের ঘনত্ব এর ওপর প্রযুক্ত চাপের-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অম্ল সমূহের তীব্রতার ক্রম: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="width: 20.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.44em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-483"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-487"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-495"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm HClO_4>H_2SO_4>HI>HBr>HCl>HNO_3&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 25</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ফিউরানে সঞ্চরণশীল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="width: 0.71em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.561em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.56em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-516"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\pi</script></span> ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যালকেন নাইট্রাইল: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="width: 5.194em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.46em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-578"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm SO_3\rightarrow</script></span> প্রশম ইলেকট্রোফাইল;&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="width: 5.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.26em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-585"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-586"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-591"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1000.62em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\rm H^+, NO_2^+\rightarrow</script></span> ধনাত্মক ইলেকট্রোফাইল।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২১৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৬]</p>

                                            <p>নিচের কোনটিতে মেটামারিজম অনুপস্থিত?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অ্যালকোহলে অবস্থান সমাণুতা ও কার্যকরী মূলক সমাণুতা দেখা যায়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.689em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.69em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-617"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-619"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.915em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1001.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-620"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-621"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 1.505em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm -{\rm NH}_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.91em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-626"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>≡</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm -C\equiv N</script></span> হলো মেটা নির্দেশক, তাই এটি বেনজিন বলয় নিষ্ক্রিয়কারী মূলক। <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>X</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="width: 2.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.8em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-632"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">X</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\rm (-X)</script></span> হ্যালোজেন অর্থো-প্যারা নির্দেশক হলেও এরা বেনজিন বলয় নিষ্ক্রিয়কারী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৩৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 40</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সোডালাইমসহ কোন প্রক্রিয়ায় অ্যালকেন পাওয়া যায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডুমা বিক্রিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কার্বক্সিলেশন বিক্রিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কুলিং পদ্ধতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হাইড্রো-ডিঅ্যালকাইলেশন বিক্রিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ডুমা বিক্রিয়ার অপর নাম ডিকার্বক্সিলেশন বিক্রিয়া বা অবরোহ পদ্ধতি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 48</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বেনজিনের ওজোন সংযোজনের ফলে কোনটি উৎপন্ন হয়?</p>

</label>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বেনজিনে ক্লোরিন সংযোজনের ফলে গ্যামেক্সিন উৎপন্ন হয়। <img alt="" src="https://ums-public-mixed.s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/CkEditor_Images/2023/m2/w3/2_74_58_1155_46636_18022023_160200592_777449.jpg" style="width: 240px; height: 23px;"><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="width: 3.691em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.008em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.96em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-718"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm HCHO </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="width: 4.182em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-752"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-753"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-755"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-757"><span style="display: inline-block; [কবীর স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬৫]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>58.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.709</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="width: 12.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.8em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-766"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-770"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-776"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">58.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.709</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>58.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.709</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm C=\frac{10x}{M}=\frac{10\times10}{58.5}=1.709\ M&nbsp; </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 53</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একজন ডায়াবেটিস রোগীর রক্তে গ্লুকোজের পরিমাণ 200mg/dL হলে এর পরিমাণ mmol/L এককে কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>12.83</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>mmol/L এককে ঘনমাত্রা&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>180</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>=</mo><mn>11.11</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1007.13em, 5.945em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-786"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1005.95em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-790"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">200</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1007.13em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -2.457em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">11.11</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-805"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-806"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>180</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>11.11</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm =\left(200\times\frac{10}{180}\right)&nbsp;\\
=11.11\ mmol/L&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>17</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="width: 1.764em;                                         <div class="serial"><span>Question 60</span></div>

                                            <p>কোনটি জারণ-বিজারণ বিক্রিয়া?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="width: 13.572em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 61</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>টাইট্রেশনে অজানা ঘনমাত্রার দ্রবণকে কী বলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইট্রেট</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ট্রাইটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইট্র্যান্ট</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আয়তনিক বিশ্লেষণে টাইট্রেশনে ব্যবহৃত প্রমাণ দ্রবণকে টাইট্র্যান্ট বা টাইটার বলে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৯২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 63</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>12g কার্বন থেকে কত গ্রাম <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="width: 2.349em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.902em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.9em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1085"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1087"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder><mo>+</mo><munder><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><munder><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>44</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="width: 6.969em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৬]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 64</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি পাত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>250</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="width: 9.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.751em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1007.75em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1116"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1127"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>250</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\rm 250\ mL\ 5\%\ HNO_3</script></span> আছে, ঘনমাত্রা ppm এ কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2500 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
