                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>25000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>5000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>50000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ppm এককে ঘনমাত্রা = শতকরা হারের ঘনমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>50000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1131"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1133"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1134"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1135"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1142"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1143"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>50000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm \times{10}^4 = 5\times{10}^4=50000\ ppm </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 65</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Cr এর জারণ সংখ্যা x&nbsp;হলে,<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="width: 15.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1012.71em, 7.133em, -999.998em); top: -4.383em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1181"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.748em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1012.71em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1182"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1184"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1196"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1005.41em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.662em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1004.43em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -1.473em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.387em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\rm \left(+1\right)\times2+2x+\left(-2\right)\times7=0&nbsp;\\ \Rightarrow2x=+12&nbsp;\\ \Rightarrow x=+6&nbsp;</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৫৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 66</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>100</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.349em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1002.35em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1218"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1220"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1221"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1222"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">℃</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>100</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">\rm 100℃</script></span>&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা ও 1 atm চাপে 1 mol পানি কী পরিমাণ আয়তন দখল করে?</p>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 67</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মিথাইল রেড ক্ষারীয় মাধ্যমে কী বর্ণ প্রদর্শন করে?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৮৯]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 68</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>50mL 0.3M NaOH এবং 50mL 0.2M HCl এর মিশ্রণটির প্রকৃতি কীরূপ হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>এসিডিক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ক্ষারীয়</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মৃদু অম্লীয়</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রশমিত NaOH এর আয়তন,&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mn>0.3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>33.33</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="width: 13.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1011.19em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1224"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1225"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1230"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1231"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1234"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1237"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1242"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">33.33</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><mn>0.3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>33.33</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm V_2=\frac{S_1V_1}{S_2}=\frac{50\times0.2}{0.3}=33.33\ mL </script></span><br>
∴ অবশিষ্ট ক্ষারের পরিমাণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>33.33</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16.66</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="width: 13.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1010.86em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1253"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1257"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">33.33</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16.66</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>33.33</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>16.66</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\rm =\left(50-33.33\right)mL=16.66\ mL</script></span><br>
তাই মিশ্রণের প্রকৃতি ক্ষারীয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 69</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মোলার শোষণ সহগ এর একক কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="width: 5.968em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 71</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>লোহার উপর জিংক ধাতুর প্রলেপ দেওয়া কী নামে পরিচিত?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তড়িৎ পরিমাণের বৃহত্তম একক হলো ফ্যারাডে (F)।<br>

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 84</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন মৌলটি হাইড্রোক্লোরিক এসিড থেকে হাইড্রোজেন অপসারণ করতে পারে না?</p>

position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৭৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 87</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি ধাতু-অ্যামালগাম ও ধাতুর আয়ন অর্ধকোষ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: চার্জমুক্ত হবার প্রবণতা সিরিজ: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 91</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ভূগর্ভে চাপাপড়া উদ্ভিদের কয়লায় রূপান্তরের প্রাথমিক রূপ কোনটি?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কাচ তৈরির উপাদান- সিলিকা বালি, চুন বা চুনাপাথর এবং সোডা অ্যাস।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৬৬]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 96</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ট্রিপসিন ও কাইমোট্রিপসিনের মিশ্রণ কি নামে পরিচিত?</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 97</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ETP-র কার্যপ্রক্রিয়ার মূলনীতি নয় কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রভাবন প্রক্রিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জীবপ্রযুক্তি প্রয়োগ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>তড়িৎবিশ্লেষণ প্রক্রিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রভাবন প্রক্রিয়া, জীবপ্রযুক্তি প্রয়োগ ও তড়িৎবিশ্লেষণ প্রক্রিয়া এগুলো ETP-র কার্যপ্রক্রিয়ার মূলনীতি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">\rm Al_2O_3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 100</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নলকূপের পানিতে থাকা আর্সেনিক দূর করতে কোন ন্যানোকণা ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আয়রন অক্সাইড</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইটেনিয়াম অক্সাইড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জিংক অক্সাইড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিকেল অক্সাইড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ব্যাকটেরিয়া প্রতিরোধ ও দুর্গন্ধ দূর করতে ন্যানো সিলভার ব্যবহার করা হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 103</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>আণবিক সংঘর্ষকালে উভয় অণুর কেন্দ্রবিন্দুর ন্যূনতম দূরত্বকে কী বলা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আণবিক ব্যাসার্ধ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সংঘর্ষ ব্যাস</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গড় মুক্তপথ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আণবিক ব্যাস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আণবিক ব্যাস সংঘর্ষ ব্যাস থেকে একটু বড় হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 110</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থায়ী খর পানিতে কোন লবণটি দ্রবীভূত থাকে না?</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 113</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="width: 7.975em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.522em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1006.49em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">D</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-159"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm BOD=3mg/L </script></span> হলে, পানির অবস্থা কেমন?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দূষণমাত্রা খারাপ</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273.15</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="width: 5.649em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.602em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1004.56em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-205"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">273.15</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.058em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>273.15</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm -273.15\ K </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পরম শূন্য তাপমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="width: 2.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.09em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm =0\ K</script></span> বা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273.15</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="width: 4.797em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">273.15</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-220"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-221"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm \frac{2}{3} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মোট মোল সংখ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="width: 10.248em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="width: 5.207em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="width: 2.625em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm =\frac{2}{3}\times </script></span> মোট চাপ<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির চাপে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="width: 2.088em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.716em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.64em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-325"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-327"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-328"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm 0°C </script></span> তাপমাত্রায় নির্দিষ্ট পরিমাণ কোনো গ্যাসের তাপমাত্রা কত বাড়ালে তার আয়তন দ্বিগুণ হবে?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="width: 4.018em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>546</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="width: 14.51em; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block;
