margin-left: -1.227em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">546</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>546</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm \Rightarrow T_2=\frac{V_2\times T_1}{V_1}=\frac{2V\times273}{V}=546\ K </script></span></p>

<p>তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>546</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>273</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="width: 11.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1009.26em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-381"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">546</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">273</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-388"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-389"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">273</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-394"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-395"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>546</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>273</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">\rm= (546-273)°C=273°C</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮]<br>
&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 122</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন গ্যাসটির পেষণ গুণাঙ্কের মান সবচেয়ে বেশি?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-423"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm H_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অম্ল সমূহের তীব্রতার ক্রম:&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="width: 20.084em;                                     </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 134</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি সমাণুতা প্রদর্শন করে?</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 137</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একক বন্ধনযুক্ত কার্যকরী মূলকে কোন বিক্রিয়াটি ঘটে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অপসারণ</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;একক বন্ধনযুক্ত কার্যকরী মূলকে প্রতিস্থাপন ও অপসারণ বিক্রিয়া ঘটে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৭৪]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২২৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 145</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উদ্ভূত পদ্ধতি অনুসারে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="width: 6.187em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="width: 15.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.46em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-725"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-742"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>−</mo><mo>&gt;</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm -CHO>-CO->-OH>-NH_2</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৮৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm CH_3-CH=CH_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="width: 5.239em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.283em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1004.24em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-801"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">≡</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>≡</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\rm HC\equiv CH </script></span></p>

vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\rm H_2SO_4 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="width: 6.969em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>106</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.943</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="width: 12.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1009.8em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-892"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.07em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-896"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-902"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">106</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.943</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>106</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.943</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">\rm C=\frac{10x}{M}=\frac{10\times10}{106}=0.943\ M </script></span></p>

<p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 153</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একজন রোগীর রক্তে গ্লুকোজের পরিমাণ 8.5 mmol/L হলে, mg/dL এককে কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="width: 3.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.42em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-912"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-915"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-916"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm mg/dL </script></span> এককে ঘনমাত্রা&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>8.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>180</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="width: 5.904em; top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-921"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-922" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-924" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-925"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-927" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>153</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="width: 5.863em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সেকেন্ডারি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড পদার্থ- <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="width: 17.398em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫২৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 161</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>আয়তনিক বিশ্লেষণকালে টাইট্রেশনে ব্যবহৃত প্রমাণ দ্রবণকে কী বলা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইট্র্যান্ড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইট্রেট</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টাইটার</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ট্রাইটার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: টাইট্রেশনে ব্যবহৃত অজানা ঘনমাত্রা দ্রবণকে টাইট্রেট বা টাইট্র্যান্ড বলে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৯২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><munder><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder><mo>+</mo><munder><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><munder><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>64</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></munder></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="width: 6.805em; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.07em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -3.359em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1177"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1178" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-1181" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.19em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1182"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1184" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; top: -3.236em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1185"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1186" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="munder" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.76em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1190"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.07em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -3.236em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1195"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">64</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><munder><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></munder><mo>+</mo><munder><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mn>32</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></munder><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><munder><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>64</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></munder></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\rm \underset {32g} S+ \underset {32g} {O_2} \rightarrow \underset {64g}&nbsp;{SO_2}</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪১৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 164</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি পাত্রে 80&nbsp;mL এ 3% NaCl আছে। লবণের ঘনমাত্রা ppm এককে কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>15000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>3000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>45000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>30000 ppm</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ppm&nbsp;এককে ঘনমাত্রা = শতকরা হারের ঘনমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>30000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="width: 12.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.45em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1199"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1201"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1202"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1203"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1210"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1211"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">30000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>30000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\rm \times{10}^4 = 3\times{10}^4=30000\ ppm </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 165</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="width: 4.734em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="width: 1.591em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.283em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.437em, 1001.23em, 2.513em, -999.997em); top: -2.252em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1243"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.257em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.184em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.066em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">+4</script></span></span></span></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Mn এর জারণ সংখ্যা x&nbsp;হলে,<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="width: 14.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1012.22em, 7.133em, -999.998em); top: -4.383em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1247"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1012.22em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1248"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1250"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1261"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1007.01em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.662em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1004.43em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -1.473em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.387em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\rm \left(+1\right)\times2+x+\left(-2\right)\times4=0 \\
\Rightarrow2+x-8=0 \\
\Rightarrow x=+6 </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৫৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="width: 11.764em; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="width: 12.42em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block;
