width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1332"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mn>0.5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm V_1=\frac{S_2V_2}{S_1}=\frac{20\times0.5}{0.5}=20\ mL </script></span>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1343"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-129">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;অবশিষ্ট <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="width: 12.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1010em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1346"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1353"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">20</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>25</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">\rm HCl= \left(25-20\right)mL=5\ mL</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1366"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;মিশ্রণের প্রকৃতি অম্লীয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 174</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মারকারি ক্যাথোড সেলে NaCl এর জলীয় দ্রবণের তড়িৎ বিশ্লেষণে কোনটি উৎপন্ন হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

vertical-align: -0.386em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-150">\rm CH_3CH_2C\left(OH\right)\left(CH_3\right)_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 190</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:SutonnyMJ">নিচের কোন আয়নটির চার্জমুক্ত হবার প্রবণতা অধিক?</span></span></span></p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:115%"><span style="font-family:SutonnyMJ">ক্যাথোডে চার্জমুক্ত হবার প্রবণতা সিরিজ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1010.21em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1755"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1756"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৭০]</span></span></span></p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 191</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি কালো ও নরম কয়লা?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;লিগনাইট-বাদামি; অ্যানথ্রাসাইট- শক্ত কয়লা।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫৪]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উদ্ভিদের মূল বৃদ্ধিতে কোন সার ভূমিকা পালন করে?</p>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;ফসসরাসে গঠিত ফসফেট সার উদ্ভিদের মূল বৃদ্ধিতে এবং পটাস সার (KCl) ফুল-ফল ধারনে ভূমিকা পালন করে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৬৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কিউরিং দু’পদ্ধতিতে করা হয়। যথা- i. আর্দ্র-লবণায়ন কিউরিং ii. ব্রাইন কিউরিং।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৭৭]</p>
</span>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1922" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.56em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1923"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1924" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1925" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1926" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">\rm ZnO </script></span>&nbsp;ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1927" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.8em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1928"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1931"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1932" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1933" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\rm TiO_2</script></span> এর ন্যানো কণা সানস্ক্রিন লোশনে ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০১]</p>
</span>
